text: JFYI, the solution to this ended up being: run webpack in development mode to reduce the number of log messages

One more note… If you’re using JIT mode and want to apply tailwind classes to something like `.hs-button` and that class doesn’t actually show up in your templates, you can just create a random text file (e.g., `purge-safelist.txt`) and add CSS classes to there. See <https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/issues/4029>
